channel.title: Hi, I'm Pete from The Coder Factory
channel.description:
I recently started a coding school in Sydney, Australia. My students are all entrepreneurial and looking to create their own tech startup companies and want to learn to code.
I'm loving my new business and career and have a lot of big plans for this coming year. I've just started blogging too so looking forward to getting better at writing. My Latest post is "[Taking coding mainstream in 2014][1]"
I also run [The Startup Community][2] site which is about to see a big overhaul. It is currently just focused on Sydney but I want to take it global :smile:
I've heard great things about this community so really excited to be a part of it. Feel free to get in touch if you have any questions about Sydney or The Coder Factory.
Pete
[1]: http://thecoderfactory.com/posts/taking-coding-mainstream-in-2014 [2]: http://thestartupcommunity.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Pete from The Coder Factory
item.dc:creator: pedrogrande
item.description:
I recently started a coding school in Sydney, Australia. My students are all entrepreneurial and looking to create their own tech startup companies and want to learn to code.

I’m loving my new business and career and have a lot of big plans for this coming year. I’ve just started blogging too so looking forward to getting better at writing. My Latest post is “Taking coding mainstream in 2014”

I also run The Startup Community site which is about to see a big overhaul. It is currently just focused on Sydney but I want to take it global

I’ve heard great things about this community so really excited to be a part of it. Feel free to get in touch if you have any questions about Sydney or The Coder Factory.
